Q: How to загрузка the desired apps?

A: Нажмите Загрузка button on various pages to загрузка your favorite apps. You can also click the иконка on top right corner of the top toolbar to open the search page, enter the desired app name, such as SYNCit, in the search box, and click Search button to locate your desired app.
Q: How to set to загрузка apps in WiFi only?
A: Нажмите the menu item иконка at top left corner on the top toolbar, select Setting, and select Загрузка in WiFi only in the загрузка settings.
Q: How to manage the apps installed/being загрузкаed in the device?

A: Нажмите the menu item иконка at top left corner of the top toolbar, and select Прилож.Управление. In this page, you can view the installed, загрузкаing, updated and favorite apps by category. In Загрузка management, you can suspend, continue or cancel загрузка задачаs and view app details. In the Update, you can update and run apps and view app details. In the Установитьed, you can uninstall, manage and run apps and view app details. In Favorites, you can загрузка apps, view app details and remove apps from Favorites.
Q: How to return to last operation page?
A: Нажмите the Return key of the system.
Q: How to register a Lenovo ID?
A: There are two ways to register: Register on app.lenovo.com, the official website, or click [Login] on the menu bar of the Магазин Lenovo client side and register on the логин page.
A: You need a stable сеть to загрузка apps. In case of загрузка failures, it is recommended to try it позже or change the сеть access mode.
Q: Why it prompts ошибка in resolving a package when an app is being installed?

A: Please identify the model, OS and internal storage space of current device and whether they match the app. If the ошибка occurs while you are updating an app, it is recommended to uninstall the версия prior to the update in Прилож.Управление, and install it позже.
Q: Why an installed app was forced to shut down when opened?

"A: Prior to running the app, please clean up memory using apps such as Phone Manager and reboot the device. If it doesn't help, please try to change the install location of the app: SD card or phone internal storage (You can complete the settings in phone's Settings - Прилож.lication)."
Q: What you can do with a Lenovo ID?
A: Lenovo ID can be used to mark favorite and buy paid apps in Магазин Lenovo, and логин all Le-series products.
Q: After an app is загрузкаed and installed, what can I do if the start иконка cannot be found?

A: If it is a normal app, please try to reboot your device. If it is a widget, please cilck Add widegt in Widget menu. If it is a wallpaper app, please open it in Система settings-Display and sensor settings - Wallpaper settings - Select a desktop wallpaper.
Q: Why cannot I run an installed game? And it prompts to require hundreds of MB data package?

A: Besides APK, some large games also require загрузкаing the data package at varied sizes. It is recommended to загрузка it in WiFi or 3G based on actual conditions. Or you can загрузка the data package on PC and import the загрузкаed file to your device. In addition, the загрузка links may be provided in some app details.

"Product introduction: Dingding Live is a phone app offering life services. It serves as a close life assistant catered to urban population and is promoted by www.ddmap.com, the largest local location and map website in China. Through this app, you can: search for the most accurate traffic route transfer plan, the neighboring stations, bus and subway service time; quickly view the information and users' comments on more than 1 million nearby businesses including restaurants, banks, hotels and cafes; загрузка nearly 10,000 coupons and discount information for various areas in China! Besides, the app also has a built-in signing-in and Weibo sync function so that you can learn the most latest trend and stay updated of the most brilliant activities in Shanghai. Function: 1. Provide accurate and practical bus and subway transfer plans and self-driving routes; 2. Provide location and business information on nearby public transportation stations, restaurants, places of leisure and entertainment, banks, hotels and gas stations; 3. Provide загрузкаing of nearly 10,000 coupons covering catering, entertainment, shopping and life services for various places in China; 4. Built-in signning-in services, sharing footprints to Weibo and take part in wonderful local activities; 5. Synchronize to Sina Weibo to share your shinning moments with your friends. 6. Community: covering push services, hot rankings, street snaps and the three hot groups of local cities. The cities include: Shanghai, Nanjing, Hangzhou, Suzhou, Guangzhou, Wuhan, Shenzhen, Beijing, Tianjin, Chengdu, Chongqing, Jinan, Nanchang, Guiyang, Harbin, Ningbo, Qingdao, Wuxi, Fuzhou, Xi'an, Changchun, Taiyuan, Sanya, Wenzhou, Changsha, Zhengzhou, Shenyang, Kunming, Dalian, Xiamen, Hefei, Changzhou, Guilin, Haikou, Nanning, Shaoxing, Xuzhou, Yangzhou, Zhenjiang, Macao, Dongguan, Foshan, Hohhot, Jiaxing, Lanzhou, Nantong, Shijiazhuang, Urumqi, Xining, Hong Kong and Zhuhai"

"You haven't enabled the Lenovo User Experience Program. After you quit from the store, the background service will be halted."

"Thank you for choosing a Lenovo mobile device! Please read the following articles carefully before enabling the User Experience Improvement Program on this device. Services that we provide through a mobile communication сеть online data center or via the Internet, according to the provisions in this user experience improvement program (hereinafter referred to as the Program), and all information, functions, content, software, hardware or services involved that we directly provide in this program are collectively called Services. This program is signed between you and Beijing Lenovo FM Technology Limited (hereinafter referred to as we or our party). According to the context, in this program, we sometimes may include our vendors, service providers, clients or staffs. While you refers to any institution and individual that agrees to take part in or use the Services. 1. Definition and Description The User Experience Improvement Program is a service we offer for Lenovo mobile devices. It is intended improve products or services and enhance the user experience. After enabling User Experience Improvement Program on your mobile device, you will enjoy the priority to try new services of the program while retaining the original functions of the mobile device. Accelerated software and hardware performance and enhanced user experience (1) Faster and smoother startup through boot optimization and acceleration; (2) Easy and convenient functions most popular among users; (3) Improved GPS enabling faster and more accurate positioning; (4) Intelligent identification and switching of сеть modes (3G, WiFi, etc.) offering you customized Internet content with minimum 3G data usage and rock-bottom fees;
Recommendations for a range of personalized content: (1) When you are battling it out in a game, we offer you загрузка links and news about the latest games you are likely to be interested in; (2) When you are immersed in music, we offer you updates and news about the singers and their concerts and new releases; (3) When you are enjoying your mobile office, we offer you the most up-to-date and popular office software and trials; (4) When you are surfing on the Internet, we offer you safe and fast access, and automatically recommend personalized content and multimedia audio-visual feasts that you are interested in, including the latest software, games, news, e-books, music and videos; (5) When you are using positioning or navigation services, we provide position-based recommendations and retrieve services for the basic necessities in life, as well as offering more accurate and efficient GPS services;
Safe and reliable software and service experience; (1) A rating/scoring cистема ensures better and safer built-in apps; (2) One-stop search, загрузка, installation and uninstallation of apps allows you to immediately experience the most popular apps and games; (3) Customize your personal storage cloud which brings unlimited data sharing among compatible phones, PCs, tablets and even multimedia TVs, helping you shake off worries about data loss.
